name: epnomad-rest-server
description: An express.js server that handles the REST API calls of EPNomad's backend.

scripts.quick-deploy: npm run build && npm run send-bundle && npm run ssh-prepare
scripts.ssh-prepare: ssh -i ../nomadKeyNVirgina.pem ubuntu@ec2-34-200-184-236.compute-1.amazonaws.com "[ -d server/ ] && rm -rf server/;unzip bundle.zip -d server/"

author: Tejas Shah (tejashah88)
